contents:
Schale DB Beta launched

A beta channel has been launched containing a preview of an upcoming major site overhaul. Please note many features are still missing, incomplete or broken as it is still under active development. It can be accessed at beta.schaledb.com and a link has been added on the home page.

• Added support for 制約解除決戦 (Limit Break Assault) raid information. These are grouped with Allied Operations under the Raids 'Other' tab.
  • Added suport for enhancing stats through Ability Release.
  • Raised the number of Specials that can be set to 4. Adding 3 or more will automatically change the stat inheritance to match 'Limit Break Assault' formations.

• Added support for T.S.A Boarding bonus stats.
  • Added calculation support for T.S.A skills. To view, the vehicle must be selected and "T.S.A Boarding" must be enabled under "Buffs".
  • Separated certain EX/Basic skills to reflect changes to in game descriptions.
• Moved the taunt effect from Hifumi's EX Skill to the Peroro Plush. (Change to the Peroro Plush summon to see the effect duration calculation).
• Adjusted the calculation for Insane/Torment CC Gauge fill to include target CC RES.

• Added information for the range, AoE size and animation length of student EX and Basic skills.
  • Normal attack information will now be shown under student skills.
  • TS and Summon skills can be expanded to show the individual normal attack and skill properties of the summon/vehicle.

• Phase change HP thresholds have been added for certain Total Assault bosses.
  • Added skill information for certain Event Challenge enemies.

• Reintroduced the previous Simplified Chinese translation as a new language option 简体中文(民译).
  • Added information for Grand Battle/Elimination Raid season rewards.
  • Fixed an issue with Serika's Unique Item not including the full stat bonus.

• Added an option to display the bonus event currency earned on event stages.
  • Bonus can be displayed based on either the maximum possible amount or the maximum amount attainable with the currently owned students.
  • Fixed issue with some stage maps not displaying linked tiles correctly.

• Added a CN server mode that will use the maximum level, drop rates and visible content on the CN server.
  • (Please note that currently, the "Current Events" section and Raid season information will not be available for the CN server mode. Translations and names may differ from those found in the official Chinese release.)
